colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI LHAG @003B BSAM RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BSTAN PAS BSKUL ZHING, SPYIR DENG DUS RJE BLA MA'I BSTAN PA 'DI NI ZUNGS ZAD KYI NAD PA SMAN PAS BOR BA BZHIN DU BDAG TU 'DZIN PA 'GA' YANG MI SNANG BAS, CUNG ZAD RE BSRID THUB NA'ANG CI MA RUNG SNYAM DU SMON PA'I YID KYIS ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES BRIS PA'O,, ,,) *, ,RGYAL SRAS SMON LAM KLUNG BRGYA 'KHYIL BA'I BCUD, ,RGYAL BSTAN SNYING PO SPEL BA'I SMON LAM 'BRAS, ,JI BZHIN SGRUB PHYIR BLA MA MCHOG GSUM LA, ,BDUD DO BSLU MED BDEN TSIG SHES BAS SKYONG,, ,,
